Counter Strike personally isn't a game that I recommend if you are looking for a fun shooter to play with friends or alone the game involves you trying really hard. Usually if you make one mistake a whole riot starts and hackers are also found in this game which causes even more stress and it's a not great game unless you are willing to put a bunch of time into it

giod game ..it took my all Money

Your team always consists of these 5 people: 
1. You
2. Russian Guy
3. Another Russian Guy
4. Russian Guy who speaks English
5. A 6 year old kid who slept with your mother

The enemy team aleways consists of these 5 people: 
1. Professional CS Player who played since 1.6
2. Amazing Lucker who always lands the perfect nades
3. Spinbotter
4. Cheater who is fake-nicking KennyS
5. A noob who calls you a cheater and says his uncle Gaben will ban you


This makes the game perfectly balanced. Amazing gameplay and a lot of fun! There is nothing like getting tapped through the Dust2 mid doors by a spinbotter with autosniper every round... ;D
